title: How to Stop Sabotaging Yourself From Success & Take Action On Your Dreams EP 1169
description:
Today’s episode is different and I’m very excited about it. Last week I put on The Greatness Challenge, which was a 5 day virtual event with me focused on building and monetizing your personal brand. Every day we had a Q&A session with VIP members and as you’ll hear in a second, sometimes it turned into a deeper conversation than: “What’s the best social media strategy to grow my business?”

I wanted to share these conversations because I know a lot of you will relate to struggling with self doubt and getting in your own way. If you’re looking for accountability to grow your brand and business, I’m excited to share that I’ve launched my new membership community for growth-minded entrepreneurs called Greatness Academy. We have over 45 trainings from me and other industry experts dedicated to helping you increase sales, grow your social media following, master public speaking, build email funnels that convert, and so much more.

If you’re ready to take your business to the next level, then visit us at lewishowes.com/academy!﻿

For more go to: lewishowes.com/1169

Daymond John on How to Close any Deal and Achieve Any Outcome: https://link.chtbl.com/928-pod

Sara Blakely on Writing Your Billion Dollar Story: https://link.chtbl.com/893-pod
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
